title:
Everybody
Gets 1
description:
Set your hand aside.

Count the number of players in the game (including yourself). Draw enought cards to give 1 card to each player, then do so.

You decide who gets what.

title: Draw 3, play 2 of them
description:
Set your hand aside.
Draw 3 cards and play 2 of them. Discard the third and continue with your turn.

This card, and all cards played becase of it, are counted as a single play.
